server {
    server_name yourdomain.com www.yourdomain.com;

    root /var/www/ä½ çš„ç¶²ç«™è³‡æ–™å¤¾;
    index index.php index.html;

    access_log /var/log/nginx/yourdomain.access.log;
    error_log  /var/log/nginx/yourdomain.error.log;

    location / {
        try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$args;
    }

    location ~ \.php$ {
        include snippets/fastcgi-php.conf;
        fastcgi_pass unix:/run/php/php8.3-fpm.sock;
    }

    location ~ /\.ht {
        deny all;
    }

    listen 443 ssl; # managed by Certbot
    ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/yourdomain.com/fullchain.pem; # managed by Certbot
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/yourdomain.com/privkey.pem; # managed by Certbot
    include /etc/letsencrypt/options-ssl-nginx.conf; # managed by Certbot
    ssl_dhparam /etc/letsencrypt/ssl-dhparams.pem; # managed by Certbot
}

server {
    if ($host = www.yourdomain.com) {
        return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
    } # managed by Certbot

    if ($host = yourdomain.com) {
        return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
    } # managed by Certbot

    listen 80;
    server_name yourdomain.com www.yourdomain.com;
    return 404; # managed by Certbot
}

參考：MacOS 將 Docker 檢測為惡意軟體問題

🔧 教學：修復 com.docker.vmnetd 的問題

當你在 macOS 上啟動 Docker Desktop 時，可能會遇到如下錯誤訊息：

「未打開 'com.docker.vmnetd'，因為它包含惡意軟體。」

這是因為 macOS 的 Gatekeeper 誤判 Docker 的網路代理元件為惡意程式。以下步驟可以手動修復該問題，讓 Docker 能正常運作。

🧰 使用終端機手動修復

📌 步驟一：刪除現有的 Helper Tools

打開「終端機」，輸入以下指令來移除出錯的元件：

sudo rm /Library/PrivilegedHelperTools/com.docker.vmnetd
sudo rm /Library/PrivilegedHelperTools/com.docker.socket
Bash

系統會要求你輸入密碼，請輸入你的 Mac 登入密碼（輸入時畫面不會顯示字元，屬正常現象）。

📌 步驟二：重新複製官方檔案

從 Docker Desktop 應用程式中，重新將正確的 com.docker.vmnetd 複製回系統目錄：

sudo cp /Applications/Docker.app/Contents/Library/LaunchServices/com.docker.vmnetd /Library/PrivilegedHelperTools/
Bash

✅ 最後，重新啟動 Docker

  1. 關閉並重新開啟 Docker Desktop。
  2. 若仍有阻擋訊息，請到：
    • 系統設定 → 隱私權與安全性 → 點選「允許執行」。

📌 附註

  • 此方法不會禁用 Gatekeeper，只是修復因誤判造成的問題。
  • 若你是從官網下載的 Docker Desktop，這些元件是安全的。
  • 建議定期更新 Docker Desktop，以避免類似問題再發生。

item.title: Android LocationApp
item.dc:creator: orcajunkai
item.content:encoded:
é€™æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹ç·´ç¿’å®šä½æ¬Šé™çš„Appï¼Œæˆ‘å°‡é‡è¦çš„éƒ¨åˆ†è¨˜éŒ„ä¸‹ä¾†ã€‚

<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" />
  • android.permission.INTERNET : å…è¨±æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼é–‹å•Ÿç¶²è·¯é€£ç·š
  • android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION : å…è¨±æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼å­˜å–ä½¿ç”¨ç²—ç•¥çš„ä½ç½®
  • android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION : å…è¨±æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼å­˜å–ä½¿ç”¨ç²¾ç¢ºçš„ä½ç½®

LocationUtils.kt

hasLocationPermission function å›å‚³ä¸€å€‹ Booleanâ†’ true æˆ– falseï¼Œä»£è¡¨æœ‰æ²’æœ‰å®šä½æ¬Šé™ã€‚

class LocationUtils(val context: Context) {
    private val _fusedLocationClient: FusedLocationProviderClient =
        LocationServices.getFusedLocationProviderClient(context)

    @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
    fun requestLocationUpdates(viewModel: LocationViewModel) {
        val locationCallback = object : LocationCallback() {
            override fun onLocationResult(locationResult: LocationResult) {
                super.onLocationResult(locationResult)
                locationResult.lastLocation?.let {
                    val location = LocationData(latitude = it.latitude, longitude = it.longitude)
                    viewModel.updateLocation(location)
                }
            }
        }
        val locationRequest = LocationRequest.Builder(
            Priority.PRIORITY_HIGH_ACCURACY, 1000
        ).build()
        _fusedLocationClient.requestLocationUpdates(
            locationRequest,
            locationCallback,
            Looper.getMainLooper()
        )
    }

    fun hasLocationPermission(context: Context): Boolean {
        return ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(
            context,
            Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
        ) == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED
                &&
                ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(
                    context,
                    Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
                ) == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED
    }

    fun reverseGeocodeLocation(location: LocationData): String {
        // The Geocoder constructor expects a java.util.Locale
        val geocoder = Geocoder(context, Locale.getDefault())
        val coordinate = LatLng(location.latitude, location.longitude)
        val addresses: MutableList<Address>? =
            geocoder.getFromLocation(coordinate.latitude, coordinate.longitude, 1)

        return if (addresses?.isNotEmpty() == true) {
            addresses[0]?.getAddressLine(0) ?: "Address line not found"
        } else {
            "Address not found"
        }
    }
}

private val _fusedLocationClient: FusedLocationProviderClient =
    LocationServices.getFusedLocationProviderClient(context)

é€™æ˜¯ Google æä¾›çš„ Fused Location Provider APIï¼Œèƒ½æ•´åˆ GPSã€Wi-Fiã€è—ç‰™èˆ‡è¡Œå‹•ç¶²è·¯çš„å®šä½ä¾†æºï¼Œè®“å®šä½æ›´æº–ç¢ºä¸”çœé›»ã€‚_fusedLocationClient ç”¨ä¾†åŸ·è¡Œã€Œè«‹æ±‚ä½ç½®æ›´æ–°ã€ã€ã€Œåœæ­¢æ›´æ–°ã€ã€ã€Œå–å¾—æœ€å¾Œä½ç½®ã€ç­‰æ“ä½œã€‚

requestLocationUpdates

@SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
fun requestLocationUpdates(viewModel: LocationViewModel) {

âš ï¸ æ³¨æ„ï¼šé€™è£¡ç”¨äº† @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")ï¼Œä»£è¡¨ä½ å¿…é ˆåœ¨å‘¼å«é€™å€‹å‡½å¼å‰ï¼Œç¢ºèªå·²å–å¾—æ¬Šé™ï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å‰é¢ LocationDisplay æª¢æŸ¥çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼‰ã€‚

æ„æ€æ˜¯ä¿è­‰å¤–å±¤ä¸€å®šæœƒå…ˆæª¢æŸ¥ hasLocationPermission() æ‰æœƒé€²ä¾†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸ç”¨å†æé†’æˆ‘ MissingPermissionã€‚

é€™å€‹å‡½å¼æœƒæ¯ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡ä½ç½®ï¼ˆå› ç‚ºä¸‹é¢è¨­å®šäº† 1000 æ¯«ç§’ï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶å¾Œå°‡æ–°ä½ç½®å‚³çµ¦ä½ çš„ LocationViewModelã€‚

val locationCallback = object : LocationCallback() {
    override fun onLocationResult(locationResult: LocationResult) {
        super.onLocationResult(locationResult)
        locationResult.lastLocation?.let {
            val location = LocationData(latitude = it.latitude, longitude = it.longitude)
            viewModel.updateLocation(location)
        }
    }
}

fun reverseGeocodeLocation(location: LocationData): String {
    val geocoder = Geocoder(context, Locale.getDefault())
    val coordinate = LatLng(location.latitude, location.longitude)

        geocoder.getFromLocation(coordinate.latitude, coordinate.longitude, 1)

@Composable
fun MyApp(modifier: Modifier) {
    val context = LocalContext.current
    val locationUtils = LocationUtils(context)
    LocationDisplay(locationUtils = locationUtils, context = context)
}
class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        enableEdgeToEdge()
        setContent {
            val viewModel: LocationViewModel = viewModel()
            LocationAppTheme {
                Scaffold(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) { innerPadding ->
                    MyApp(viewModel = viewModel,modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding))
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

Contextï¼š æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹æ ¸å¿ƒçš„ Android ç³»çµ±é¡åˆ¥ï¼Œå®ƒæä¾›äº†æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼å…¨åŸŸè³‡è¨Šï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚è³‡æºã€è³‡æ–™åº«ã€æ–‡ä»¶ç³»çµ±è·¯å¾‘ï¼Œä»¥åŠå­˜å–ç³»çµ±æœå‹™ï¼ˆå¦‚å®šä½æœå‹™ï¼‰çš„ç®¡é“ã€‚

LocalContext.currentï¼š é€™æ˜¯ Jetpack Compose æ¡†æ¶æä¾›çš„ä¸€å€‹ CompositionLocalã€‚å®ƒç”¨æ–¼åœ¨å¯çµ„åˆå‡½æ•¸ä¸­å­˜å– Android æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼çš„ Context ç‰©ä»¶ã€‚

LocationDisplay(locationUtils = locationUtils, context = context) é€™è¡Œç¨‹å¼ç¢¼çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯èª¿ç”¨ä¸€å€‹åç‚º LocationDisplay çš„ Compose UI å…ƒä»¶ï¼Œå‘å®ƒå‚³éæ‰€éœ€çš„è³‡æ–™å’Œç’°å¢ƒä¾è³´ã€‚

@Composable
fun LocationDisplay(
    locationUtils: LocationUtils,
    viewModel: LocationViewModel,
    context: Context
) {
    val location = viewModel.location.value
    
    val address = location?.let {
        locationUtils.reverseGeocodeLocation(location)
    }

    val requestPermissionLauncher = rememberLauncherForActivityResult(
        contract = ActivityResultContracts.RequestMultiplePermissions(),
        onResult = { permissions ->
            if (permissions[Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION] == true
                && permissions[Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION] == true
            ) {
                // æ“æœ‰ location æ¬Šé™
                locationUtils.requestLocationUpdates(viewModel = viewModel)

            } else {
                // è¦æ±‚æ¬Šé™
                val rationaleRequired = ActivityCompat.shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale(
                    context as MainActivity,
                    Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
                ) || ActivityCompat.shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale(
                    context as MainActivity,
                    Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
                )

                if (rationaleRequired) {
                    Toast.makeText(
                        context,
                        "Location Permission is required for this feature to work",
                        Toast.LENGTH_LONG
                    ).show()
                } else {
                    Toast.makeText(
                        context,
                        "Location Permission is required, Please enable from settings",
                        Toast.LENGTH_LONG
                    ).show()
                }
            }
        }
    )

    Column(
        modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
        horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
        verticalArrangement = Arrangement.Center
    ) {
        if(location != null) {
            Text("Address: ${location.latitude} ${location.longitude} 
 $address ")
        }
        Text(text = "Location not available")

        Button(onClick = {
            if (locationUtils.hasLocationPermission(context)) {
                locationUtils.requestLocationUpdates(viewModel)
            } else {
                requestPermissionLauncher.launch(
                    arrayOf(
                        Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION,
                        Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
                    )
                )
            }
        }) {
            Text(text = "Get Location")
        }
    }
}

# Define model
class NeuralNetwork(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.flatten = nn.Flatten()
        self.linear_relu_stack = nn.Sequential(
            nn.Linear(28*28, 512), ï¼ƒ è¼¸å…¥,è¼¸å‡ºç¥ç¶“å…ƒå€‹æ•¸
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Linear(512, 512),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Linear(512, 10)

    ï¼ƒ x å°±æ˜¯ 28 * 28çš„è³‡æ–™
    def forward(self, x):
        x = self.flatten(x)
        logits = self.linear_relu_stack(x)
        return logits

Optimizing the Model Parameters å„ªåŒ–æ¨¡å‹åƒæ•¸

optimizer = torch.optim.SGD(model.parameters(), lr=1e-3) #æœ€ä½³åŒ– lr = 0.001

CrossEntropyLoss æœ‰å…©å€‹åŠŸèƒ½ :

  • Softmaxï¼ˆæŠŠæ¨¡å‹è¼¸å‡ºçš„ logits è½‰ç‚ºæ©Ÿç‡åˆ†ä½ˆï¼‰
  • Negative Log-Likelihood (NLLLoss)ï¼ˆè¡¡é‡é æ¸¬èˆ‡çœŸå¯¦ç­”æ¡ˆçš„å·®è·ï¼‰

SGDã€Adam éƒ½æ˜¯é©æ‡‰æ€§çš„æ¼”ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå‹•æ…‹èª¿æ•´ learning rateã€‚

model.parameters() : æ¬Šé‡çš„æ›´æ–°

lr=1e-3 ï¼šå­¸ç¿’ç‡ï¼ˆlearning rateï¼‰= 0.001ï¼Œæ§åˆ¶æ¯æ¬¡æ›´æ–°çš„æ­¥ä¼å¤§å°ã€‚

def train(dataloader, model, loss_fn, optimizer):
    size = len(dataloader.dataset)
    model.train() #åˆ‡æ›åˆ°è¨“ç·´æ¨¡å¼
    for batch, (X, y) in enumerate(dataloader):
        X, y = X.to(device), y.to(device) #æ”¾å€’GPU

        # Compute prediction error
        pred = model(X)
        loss = loss_fn(pred, y)

        # Backpropagation
        loss.backward() #åå‘å‚³æ’­ è¨ˆç®—æ¢¯åº¦
        optimizer.step() #å­¸æ±è¥¿
        optimizer.zero_grad() #å°‡ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡çš„åƒæ•¸æ­¸é›¶

        if batch % 100 == 0:
            loss, current = loss.item(), (batch + 1) * len(X
            print(f"loss: {loss:>7f}  [{current:>5d}/{size:>5d}]")

len(dataloader.dataset)ï¼šå–å¾—æ•´å€‹è¨“ç·´è³‡æ–™é›†çš„ç¸½ç­†æ•¸ã€‚

model.train()ï¼šè¨­å®šç‚ºè¨“ç·´æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆå•Ÿç”¨ dropoutã€batchnorm ç­‰è¨“ç·´å°ˆç”¨å±¤çš„è¡Œç‚ºï¼‰ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨ enumerate(dataloader)ï¼šä¸€æ‰¹ä¸€æ‰¹åœ°å¾ DataLoader æ‹¿è³‡æ–™ã€‚(X, y)ï¼šX æ˜¯è¼¸å…¥å½±åƒï¼Œy æ˜¯çœŸå¯¦æ¨™ç±¤ã€‚

.to(device)ï¼šæŠŠè³‡æ–™æ”¾åˆ°ç›¸åŒçš„è£ç½®ä¸Šï¼ˆå¦‚ GPUï¼‰ï¼Œç¢ºä¿å’Œæ¨¡å‹ä¸€è‡´ã€‚

pred = model(X)

æŠŠåœ–ç‰‡é€é€²æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œå–å¾—é æ¸¬çµæœï¼ˆlogitsï¼‰ã€‚æ­¤æ™‚ pred çš„å½¢ç‹€æœƒæ˜¯ [64, 10]ï¼ˆ64 å¼µåœ–ã€10 é¡åˆ¥ï¼‰ã€‚

loss = loss_fn(pred, y)

ç”¨æå¤±å‡½æ•¸å¾—åˆ°ç›®å‰é€™ä¸€æ‰¹çš„ã€Œå¹³å‡èª¤å·®ã€ã€‚

loss.backward() : è¨ˆç®—æ¢¯åº¦ï¼ˆåå‘å‚³é Backpropagationï¼‰

optimizer.step() : æ ¹æ“šæ¢¯åº¦æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹æ¬Šé‡

optimizer.zero_grad() : æ¸…ç©ºèˆŠæ¢¯åº¦ï¼ˆé¿å…ç´¯ç©ï¼‰

æœ€å¾Œæ¯ 100 å€‹ batch é¡¯ç¤ºä¸€æ¬¡é€²åº¦èˆ‡ç›®å‰æå¤±å€¼ã€‚

def test(dataloader, model, loss_fn):
    size = len(dataloader.dataset)
    num_batches = len(dataloader)
    model.eval()
    test_loss, correct = 0, 0
    with torch.no_grad():
        for X, y in dataloader:
            X, y = X.to(device), y.to(device)
            pred = model(X)
            test_loss += loss_fn(pred, y).item() #æ¯”å°64ç­†è³‡æ–™
            correct += (pred.argmax(1) == y).type(torch.float).sum().item()
    test_loss /= num_batches
    correct /= size
    print(f"Test Error: \n Accuracy: {(100*correct):>0.1f}%, Avg loss: {test_loss:>8f} \n")

sizeï¼šæ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™ç¸½ç­†æ•¸ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ 10,000 å¼µ FashionMNIST åœ–ï¼‰

num_batchesï¼šDataLoader çš„æ‰¹æ¬¡æ•¸é‡ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ 10,000 Ã· 64 â‰ˆ 157 æ‰¹ï¼‰

model.eval() : æŠŠæ¨¡å‹åˆ‡æ›ç‚º evaluation mode (è©•ä¼°æ¨¡å¼)ã€‚

argmax(list) : é¸å‡ºæ•¸å­—æœ€å¤§çš„ï¼Œç„¶å¾Œå–å‡ºç´¢å¼•å€¼ã€‚

test_lossè¶Šå°è¡¨ç¤ºå­¸ç¿’æ•ˆæœè¶Šå¥½

  • sizeï¼šæ•´å€‹æ¸¬è©¦è³‡æ–™é›†çš„æ¨£æœ¬ç¸½æ•¸ã€‚
  • num_batchesï¼šç¸½å…±æœ‰å¹¾å€‹æ‰¹æ¬¡ï¼ˆbatchï¼‰ã€‚
  • model.eval()ï¼šåˆ‡æ›æˆã€Œè©•ä¼°æ¨¡å¼ã€ï¼Œåœç”¨è¨“ç·´æ™‚çš„è¡Œç‚ºï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ dropoutã€batchnorm æ›´æ–°ï¼‰ã€‚
  • test_lossã€correctï¼šç”¨ä¾†ç´¯ç©æ¸¬è©¦çš„çµæœã€‚

é—œé–‰æ¢¯åº¦è¨ˆç®—

with torch.no_grad():
  • æ¸¬è©¦éšæ®µä¸éœ€è¦è¨“ç·´ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸éœ€è¦åå‘å‚³æ’­æ¢¯åº¦ã€‚
  • torch.no_grad() å¯ä»¥ç¯€çœè¨˜æ†¶é«”èˆ‡åŠ å¿«é‹ç®—é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚

ä¸»è¦æ¸¬è©¦è¿´åœˆ

for X, y in dataloader:
    X, y = X.to(device), y.to(device)
    pred = model(X)
    test_loss += loss_fn(pred, y).item()  # ç´¯ç©æ¯å€‹ batch çš„ loss
    correct += (pred.argmax(1) == y).type(torch.float).sum().item()

è©³ç´°è§£é‡‹ï¼š

å¹³å‡åŒ–çµæœèˆ‡è¼¸å‡º

test_loss /= num_batches
correct /= size
print(f"Test Error: \n Accuracy: {(100*correct):>0.1f}%, Avg loss: {test_loss:>8f} \n")
  • test_loss /= num_batchesï¼šè¨ˆç®—æ•´é«”å¹³å‡æå¤±ã€‚
  • correct /= sizeï¼šè¨ˆç®—æ•´é«”æº–ç¢ºç‡ã€‚
  • print()ï¼šè¼¸å‡ºæ¸¬è©¦çµæœã€‚
epochs = 5
for t in range(epochs):
    print(f"Epoch {t+1}\n-------------------------------")
    train(train_dataloader, model, loss_fn, optimizer)
    test(test_dataloader, model, loss_fn)

ä»¥é€™å€‹ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ä¾†èªªepochsæ˜¯5ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¨“ç·´5æ¬¡çš„æ„æ€ã€‚

Saving Models

print("Saved PyTorch Model State to model.pth")

å°‡æ¨¡å‹çš„åƒæ•¸å„²å­˜åˆ°ä¸€å€‹æª”æ¡ˆ "model.pth" ä¸­ã€‚

ä¹‹å¾Œå¯ä»¥å†ç¹¼çºŒè¨“ç·´æˆ–æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

Loading Models

    "T-shirt/top",

é€™æ¬¡çš„ä½œæ¥­ä¸»è¦æ˜¯è¦æ ¹æ“šä»¥ä¸‹å››å€‹è¡Œç¨‹ï¼ˆProcessesï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„ CPU æ’ç¨‹æ¼”ç®—æ³•ï¼Œè¨ˆç®—æ¯å€‹æ¼”ç®—æ³•çš„å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼ˆAverage Waiting Time, WTï¼‰ã€‚

å–®ä½ï¼šæ™‚é–“å–®ä½

éœ€è¦è¨ˆç®—çš„æ’ç¨‹æ¼”ç®—æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  1. FCFSï¼ˆFirst Come First Serveï¼Œå…ˆä¾†å…ˆæœå‹™ï¼‰
  2. SJFï¼ˆShortest Job Firstï¼Œéæ¶å…ˆï¼‰
  3. SRTFï¼ˆShortest Remaining Time Firstï¼Œå¯æ¶å…ˆï¼‰
  4. RRï¼ˆRound Robinï¼Œæ™‚é–“ç‰‡ q=4ï¼‰

å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š
(0 + 7 + 15 + 9) / 4 = 8.75

äºŒã€SJF

å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š
(0 + 7 + 15 + 9) / 4 = 7.75

ä¸‰ã€SRTF

P1 : 8 -> 7 -> 0

P2 : 4 -> 0

P3 : 9 -> 0

P4 : 5 -> 0

è¨ˆç®—ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š

å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š

å››ã€RRï¼ˆæ™‚é–“ç‰‡ q = 4ï¼‰

è¡Œç¨‹åŸ·è¡Œé †åºï¼šP1 â†’ P2 â†’ P3 â†’ P4 â†’ P1 â†’ P3 â†’ P4 â†’ P3

è¨ˆç®—ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š

å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š

äº”ã€Priority

(1) éæ¶å…ˆ Priority

å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š
(0 + 7 + 15 + 9) / 4 = 7.75

(2) å¯æ¶å…ˆ Priority

P1 : 8 -> 7 -> 0

P2 : 4 -> 0

P3 : 9 -> 0

P4 : 5 -> 0

è¡Œç¨‹åŸ·è¡Œé †åºï¼šP1 â†’ P2 â†’ P4 -> P1 â†’ P3

è¨ˆç®—ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼š

  • WTâ‚ = 17 - 8 = 9

ç”±çµæœå¯çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œå¯æ¶å…ˆå‹çš„ SRTF èˆ‡ Priority æ¼”ç®—æ³•åœ¨æ­¤æ¡ˆä¾‹ä¸­å…·æœ‰æœ€çŸ­çš„å¹³å‡ç­‰å¾…æ™‚é–“ï¼ˆ6.5ï¼‰ï¼Œæ•ˆç‡æœ€ä½³ã€‚

item.title: Training a Classifier
item.dc:creator: orcajunkai
item.content:encoded:
ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼èˆ‡è³‡æ–™åƒè€ƒä¾†æºï¼šhttps://docs.pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/cifar10_tutorial.html#define-a-convolutional-neural-network

import torch
import torchvision
import torchvision.transforms as transforms
transform = transforms.Compose(
    [transforms.ToTensor(),
     transforms.Normalize((0.5, 0.5, 0.5), (0.5, 0.5, 0.5))])

batch_size = 4

trainset = torchvision.datasets.CIFAR10(root='./data', train=True,
                                        download=True, transform=transform)
trainloader = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(trainset, batch_size=batch_size,
                                          shuffle=True, num_workers=2)

testset = torchvision.datasets.CIFAR10(root='./data', train=False,
                                       download=True, transform=transform)
testloader = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(testset, batch_size=batch_size,
                                         shuffle=False, num_workers=2)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# functions to show an image


def imshow(img):
    img = img / 2 + 0.5     # unnormalize
    npimg = img.numpy()
    plt.imshow(np.transpose(npimg, (1, 2, 0)))
    plt.show()


# get some random training images

images, labels = next(dataiter)

# show images
imshow(torchvision.utils.make_grid(images))
# print labels
print(' '.join(f'{classes[labels[j]]:5s}' for j in range(batch_size)))

import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F


class Net(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.conv1 = nn.Conv2d(3, 6, 5)
        self.pool = nn.MaxPool2d(2, 2)
        self.conv2 = nn.Conv2d(6, 16, 5)
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(16 * 5 * 5, 120)
        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(120, 84)
        self.fc3 = nn.Linear(84, 10)

    def forward(self, x):
        x = self.pool(F.relu(self.conv1(x)))
        x = self.pool(F.relu(self.conv2(x)))
        x = torch.flatten(x, 1) # flatten all dimensions except batch
        x = F.relu(self.fc1(x))
        x = F.relu(self.fc2(x))
        x = self.fc3(x)
        return x


net = Net()

æ¥è‘—ï¼Œoptimizer = optim.SGD(net.parameters(), lr=0.001, momentum=0.9) é€™è¡Œè¨­å®šäº†å„ªåŒ–å™¨ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯éš¨æ©Ÿæ¢¯åº¦ä¸‹é™æ³•ï¼ˆStochastic Gradient Descent, SGDï¼‰ã€‚åœ¨è¨“ç·´ç¥ç¶“ç¶²è·¯æ™‚ï¼Œæ¨¡å‹æœƒæ ¹æ“šæå¤±å‡½æ•¸çš„å€¼è¨ˆç®—å‡ºæ¢¯åº¦ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ¬Šé‡æ‡‰è©²å¦‚ä½•èª¿æ•´ä»¥é™ä½æå¤±ã€‚SGD å°±æ˜¯é€éé€™äº›æ¢¯åº¦é€æ­¥æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹çš„åƒæ•¸ã€‚net.parameters() è¡¨ç¤ºè¦è®“å„ªåŒ–å™¨ç®¡ç†ç¶²è·¯ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å¯å­¸ç¿’çš„æ¬Šé‡ï¼›lr=0.001 å‰‡æ˜¯è¨­å®šå­¸ç¿’ç‡ï¼ˆlearning rateï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ¯æ¬¡æ›´æ–°æ¬Šé‡æ™‚çš„æ­¥ä¼å¤§å°ã€‚å­¸ç¿’ç‡å¤ªå¤§æœƒå°è‡´è¨“ç·´ä¸ç©©å®šã€æå¤±å€¼éœ‡ç›ªï¼›å¤ªå°å‰‡æœƒè®“æ”¶æ–‚é€Ÿåº¦è®Šæ…¢ã€‚æœ€å¾Œçš„ momentum=0.9 æ˜¯å‹•é‡åƒæ•¸ï¼Œå®ƒèƒ½å¹«åŠ©æ¨¡å‹åœ¨è¨“ç·´éç¨‹ä¸­æ›´é †åˆ©åœ°å‰é€²ï¼Œæ¸›å°‘åœ¨å±€éƒ¨æœ€å°å€¼é™„è¿‘éœ‡ç›ªçš„æƒ…æ³ã€‚å‹•é‡çš„æ¦‚å¿µå°±åƒ æ¨çƒä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œç•¶çƒåœ¨æ–œå¡ä¸Šæ»¾å‹•æ™‚ï¼Œæœƒä¿ç•™éƒ¨åˆ†å‰ä¸€æ¬¡çš„é€Ÿåº¦ï¼Œè®“æ›´æ–°æ–¹å‘æ›´å¹³æ»‘ã€åŠ é€Ÿæ”¶æ–‚ã€‚

ç¸½çµä¾†èªªï¼Œé€™æ®µç¨‹å¼çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯å»ºç«‹è¨“ç·´æ¨¡å‹æ™‚çš„ã€Œå­¸ç¿’æ©Ÿåˆ¶ã€ï¼šäº¤å‰ç†µæå¤±è² è²¬å‘Šè¨´ç¶²è·¯ã€Œé æ¸¬éŒ¯äº†å¤šå°‘ã€ï¼Œè€Œ SGD å„ªåŒ–å™¨å‰‡æ ¹æ“šé€™äº›éŒ¯èª¤å»å¾®èª¿æ¬Šé‡ï¼Œè®“æ¨¡å‹ä¸€æ­¥æ­¥å­¸æœƒæ›´æº–ç¢ºåœ°åˆ†é¡å½±åƒã€‚

Train the network

for epoch in range(2):  # loop over the dataset multiple times

    running_loss = 0.0
    for i, data in enumerate(trainloader, 0):
        # get the inputs; data is a list of [inputs, labels]
        inputs, labels = data

        # zero the parameter gradients
        optimizer.zero_grad()

        # forward + backward + optimize
        outputs = net(inputs)
        loss = criterion(outputs, labels)
        loss.backward()
        optimizer.step()

        # print statistics
        running_loss += loss.item()
        if i % 2000 == 1999:    # print every 2000 mini-batches
            print(f'[{epoch + 1}, {i + 1:5d}] loss: {running_loss / 2000:.3f}')
            running_loss = 0.0

print('Finished Training')

item.title: Next.js v16 Cache å¿«å–
item.dc:creator: orcajunkai
item.content:encoded:
Next.jsçš„Cacheè·¨äº†å¾ˆå¤šå±¤ï¼Œ...

Enabling Cache Components

// next.config.ts
import type { NextConfig } from "next";

const nextConfig: NextConfig = {
  cacheComponents: true,
};

export default nextConfig;

å¿«å–é è¨­æ˜¯è¢«é—œé–‰çš„ï¼Œæ‰“é–‹å¾Œå°±å¯ä»¥é–‹å§‹æ±ºå®šå“ªäº›Routesã€Componentsã€Functionè¦è¢«å¿«å–ã€‚

å¦‚æœæœ‰è¨­å®š"use cache"å°±æœƒå‘Šè¨´next.jså¦‚æœè¼¸å…¥æ²’æœ‰æ”¹è®Šï¼Œå°±è¼¸å‡ºèˆŠçš„å¿«å–ã€‚

ä»¥å®˜æ–¹æ–‡ä»¶çš„ä¾‹å­ä¾†çœ‹ :

import { cacheLife } from 'next/cache'
 
export default async function Page() {
  'use cache'
  cacheLife({
    stale: 3600, // 1 hour until considered stale
    revalidate: 7200, // 2 hours until revalidated
    expire: 86400, // 1 day until expired
  })
 
  const users = await db.query('SELECT * FROM users')
 
  return (
    <ul>
      {users.map((user) => (
        <li key={user.id}>{user.name}</li>
      ))}
    </ul>
  )
}

#!/bin/bash

CONFIG="/root/backup/config/sites.conf"
DATE=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d-%H%M")

while IFS='|' read -r SITE DB_NAME DB_USER DB_PASS WP_PATH
do
    # è·³éç©ºè¡Œèˆ‡è¨»è§£è¡Œ
    [[ -z "$SITE" || "$SITE" =~ ^# ]] && continue

    mysqldump --single-transaction --quick --skip-lock-tables \
        -u"$DB_USER" -p"$DB_PASS" "$DB_NAME" > "$DB_FILE"

    echo "â¤ ä¸Šå‚³è³‡æ–™åº«â€¦ï¼ˆå«é€²åº¦ï¼‰"

    do

    #######################################

    tar -czf "$WP_FILE" \

// about/error.tsx
'use client' // Error boundaries must be Client Components
 
import { useEffect } from 'react'
 
export default function Error({
  error,
  reset,
}: {
  error: Error & { digest?: string }
  reset: () => void
}) {
  useEffect(() => {
    // Log the error to an error reporting service
    console.error(error)
  }, [error])
 
  return (
    <div>
      <h2>Something went wrong!</h2>
      <button
        onClick={
          // Attempt to recover by trying to re-render the segment
          () => reset()
        }
      >
        Try again
      </button>
    </div>
  )
}

import { useState,useEffect } from 'react';

function album1() {
    const [albums, setAlbums] = useState([]);

    useEffect(() => {
        const fetchAlbums = async () => {
            try {
                const response = await fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums")
                const data = await response.json();
                setAlbums(data);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error("Error fetching albums:", error);
            }
        };
        fetchAlbums();
    }, []);

    return (
        <div className=''>
            {albums.map((album: {id: number; title: string}) => (
                <div key={album.id} className=''>
                    <h3>{album.title}</h3>
                    <p>Album ID: {album.id}</p>
                </div>
            ))}
        </div>
    )
}

export default album1;

    const response = await fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums");
    if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to fetch data");

    return (
        <main className="min-h-screen bg-slate-50 py-8">
            <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4">
                <h1 className="text-2xl font-semibold text-slate-900 mb-6">
                    Albums
                </h1>

                <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                    {albums.map((album: { id: number; title: string }) => (
                        <div
                            key={album.id}
                            className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-slate-200 p-4 shadow-sm 
                                       hover:shadow-md hover:-translate-y-0.5 
                                       transition-transform transition-shadow duration-150"
                        >
                            <h3 className="text-base font-semibold text-slate-900 mb-1">
                                {album.title}
                            </h3>
                            <p className="text-xs text-slate-500">
                                ID: {album.id}
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    ))}
                </div>
            </div>
        </main>
    );
}

export default AlbumsPage;

# åŒ¯å…¥æ‰€éœ€çš„å‡½å¼åº«
import PIL
import streamlit as st
from ultralytics import YOLO

# æ›¿æ›æˆæ‚¨çš„æ¬Šé‡æª”æ¡ˆçš„ç›¸å°è·¯å¾‘
model_path = 'weights/best.pt'

# è¨­å®šé é¢ä½ˆå±€
st.set_page_config(
    page_title="ç‰©ä»¶åµæ¸¬",  # è¨­å®šé é¢æ¨™é¡Œ
    page_icon="ğŸ¤–",      # è¨­å®šé é¢åœ–ç¤º
    layout="wide",       # è¨­å®šä½ˆå±€ç‚ºå¯¬ç‰ˆ
    initial_sidebar_state="expanded",    # é è¨­å±•é–‹å´é‚Šæ¬„
)

# å»ºç«‹å´é‚Šæ¬„
with st.sidebar:
    st.header("åœ–ç‰‡é…ç½®")      # åœ¨å´é‚Šæ¬„æ–°å¢æ¨™é¡Œ
    # åœ¨å´é‚Šæ¬„æ–°å¢æª”æ¡ˆä¸Šå‚³å™¨ï¼Œç”¨æ–¼é¸æ“‡åœ–ç‰‡
    source_img = st.file_uploader(
        "ä¸Šå‚³åœ–ç‰‡...", type=("jpg", "jpeg", "png", 'bmp', 'webp'))

    # æ¨¡å‹é¸é …
    confidence = float(st.slider(
        "é¸æ“‡æ¨¡å‹ä¿¡å¿ƒé–¾å€¼", 25, 100, 40)) / 100

# å»ºç«‹ä¸»é é¢æ¨™é¡Œ
st.title("ç‰©ä»¶åµæ¸¬")
st.caption('ä¸Šå‚³ä¸€å¼µå¸¶æœ‰é€™äº›:blue[æ‰‹å‹¢è¨Šè™Ÿ]çš„ç…§ç‰‡ï¼š:+1:, :hand:, :i_love_you_hand_sign:, å’Œ :spock-hand:.')
st.caption('ç„¶å¾Œé»æ“Š:blue[åµæ¸¬ç‰©ä»¶]æŒ‰éˆ•ä¸¦æŸ¥çœ‹çµæœã€‚')
# åœ¨ä¸»é é¢å»ºç«‹å…©å€‹æ¬„ä½
col1, col2 = st.columns(2)

# å¦‚æœåœ–ç‰‡å·²ä¸Šå‚³ï¼Œå‰‡å°‡åœ–ç‰‡æ–°å¢åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹æ¬„ä½
with col1:
    if source_img:
        # é–‹å•Ÿä¸Šå‚³çš„åœ–ç‰‡
        uploaded_image = PIL.Image.open(source_img)
        # å°‡ä¸Šå‚³çš„åœ–ç‰‡æ–°å¢åˆ°é é¢ï¼Œä¸¦é™„ä¸Šæ¨™é¡Œ
        st.image(source_img,
                 caption="ä¸Šå‚³çš„åœ–ç‰‡",
                 use_column_width=True
                 )

try:
    model = YOLO(model_path)
except Exception as ex:
    st.error(
        f"ç„¡æ³•è¼‰å…¥æ¨¡å‹ã€‚è«‹æª¢æŸ¥æŒ‡å®šçš„è·¯å¾‘ï¼š{model_path}")
    st.error(ex)

if st.sidebar.button('åµæ¸¬ç‰©ä»¶'):
    res = model.predict(uploaded_image,
                        conf=confidence
                        )
    boxes = res[0].boxes
    res_plotted = res[0].plot()[:, :, ::-1]
    with col2:
        st.image(res_plotted,
                 caption='åµæ¸¬çµæœåœ–ç‰‡',
                 use_column_width=True
                 )
        try:

using UnityEngine;

using System.Collections;

public class GameMusicPlayer : MonoBehaviour
{
    private void Start() {
        MusicData music = GameData.selectedMusic;

}
